question: Which two countries share the location of the "North Hungarian Mountains"?
explanation: Hungary and Slovakia are the two countries that share the location of the "North Hungarian Mountains". The North Hungarian Mountains is the northern, mountainous part of Hungary. It forms a geographical unity with the Matra-Slanec Area, the adjacent parts of Slovakia. It is a separate geomorphological area within the Western Carpathians. The mountains run along the northeastern border of Hungary as well as eastern parts of the Hungarianâ€“Slovak border in broadband from the Danube Bend to the town of Presov.
